public class MongoQuery
extends org.springframework.datastore.mapping.query.Query

Geospacial query for values near the given two dimensional list

withinBox

public org.springframework.datastore.mapping.query.Query withinBox(String property,
                                                                   List value)
Geospacial query for values within a given box. A box is defined as a multi-dimensional list in the form [[40.73083, -73.99756], [40.741404, -73.988135]]

Parameters:
property - The property
value - A multi-dimensional list of values
Returns:
This query

withinCircle

public org.springframework.datastore.mapping.query.Query withinCircle(String property,
                                                                      List value)
Geospacial query for values within a given circle. A circle is defined as a multi-dimensial list containing the position of the center and the radius: [[50, 50], 10]

Parameters:
property - The property
value - A multi-dimensional list of values
Returns:
This query
